more_info.characteristics: Metal scavenger, stabiliser (also used after heavy metal intoxication to remove metals from the body).
more_info.side_effects: None known in the concentrations used. Long-term exposure to high doses may result in depletion of metal(s) from the body (iron).
more_info.dietary_restrictions: EDTA and edetates can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.
